channel.title: Random on Rehan Vipin
channel.description: Recent content in Random on Rehan Vipin

item.title: My core beliefs
item.description: A few things I believe : Optimal states are a balance of options. Applies to all points below too First make things work, then make them perfect over iterations Work for things close to you before changing the world Careful planning in the start can save a lot of time later on Miscommunication is a major problem that we should work more on Success is determined by a mix of effort you put in and the opportunities you have
